cab.content: // . -THE TURCO-GREEK SITUATION.CO-OPERATION OF T&E DOMINIONS *PARAPHRASE TELEGRAM from tho Governor*General of New Zealand to the Secretary of State for the Colonies, dated 19th Seotember,(Received Colonial Office 10.36 a.m. 19th September 1922)(Circulated by the Secretary of State for the Colonies ). (Previous Papers: CPs. 4195 and 4196).Following from my Prime Minister for Prime Minister begins. I should be glad to receive early information as tc whether Immediate despatch of small contingent Is required for sake of moral effect to be followed if necessary by reinforcements.It would be of assistance if recommendation could be /: wade as to strength and composition of advance contingent and of larger force. /JELLICOE.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W., 19th September, 1922.cabinet.
